channel.title: Hey this is important i really need help on getting all of this running
channel.description: [size=10pt][size=10pt][b]ok ok ok.... i really need help and i wanna know what exactly do i have to download and stuff so please help me out!!! :( :confused: im not liking not being able to play it i played once for 20 minutes then it quit so ummm help please!!![/b][/size][/size]

item.title: Hey this is important i really need help on getting all of this running
item.dc:creator: @Aartje7 Aartje7
item.description:
@Aartje7 wrote:

go to the section runescape tutorials, and go to Mod Taharoks guide, it will help u alot

Read full topic

item.title: Hey this is important i really need help on getting all of this running
item.dc:creator: @I_Br3ndan_I I Br3ndan I
item.description:
@I_Br3ndan_I wrote:

Ok, so you’ve downloaded a source right? Once you’ve done that, you need to right click it and ‘Extract Here’. Once you’ve done that, go into the file (E.G Testscape) and double click runserver. That’s how to get you’re server running.

Read full topic
